info.title: HyperscaleCitusManagementClient
info.description: The Microsoft Azure management API provides create, read, update, and delete functionality for Cosmos DB for PostgreSQL resources including clusters, servers, databases, firewall rules, VNET rules, security alert policies, log files and configurations.

get.description: List all the clusters in a given subscription.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: List all the clusters in a given resource group.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates a new cluster with servers.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The required parameters for creating or updating a cluster.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.
Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes a cluster together with servers in it.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: Updates an existing cluster. The request body can contain one to many of the properties present in the normal server group definition.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The parameters for updating a server group.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists servers of a server group.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets information about a server in server group.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: List all the configurations of a server in server group.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: List all the configurations of a server group.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: Updates configuration of server role groups in a server group

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The required parameters for updating a server group configuration.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets information about single server group configuration.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates a new firewall rule or updates an existing firewall rule.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The required parameters for creating or updating a firewall rule.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes a server group firewall rule.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets information about a server group firewall rule.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: List all the firewall rules in a given server group.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates a new role or updates an existing role.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The required parameters for creating or updating a role.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.
Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: List all the roles in a given server group.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.
Error response describing why the operation failed.
Error response describing why the operation failed.
Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Check the availability of name for resource

parameters.name: nameAvailabilityRequest
parameters.description: The required parameters for checking if resource name is available.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all of the available REST API operations.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets list of private endpoint connections on a server group.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

200.description: Successfully retrieved a specified private endpoint connection.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Approve or reject a private endpoint connection with a given name.

200.description: Successfully approved or rejected private endpoint connection.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes a private endpoint connection with a given name.

204.description: Private endpoint connection does not exist.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets the private link resources for server group.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets a private link resource for server group.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

storageQuotaInMb.description: The storage of a server in MB (max: 2097152 = 2TiB).

vCores.description: The vCores count of a server (max: 64).

enableHa.description: If high availability is enabled or not for the server.

enablePublicIp.description: If public IP is requested or not for a server.

ServerNameItem.description: The name object for a server.

fullyQualifiedDomainName.description: The fully qualified domain name of a server.

ServerGroupServerProperties.description: The properties of a server in server group.

fullyQualifiedDomainName.description: The fully qualified domain name of a server.

role.description: The role of server in the cluster.

state.description: A state of a server group/server that is visible to user.

haState.description: A state of HA feature for the cluster.

administratorLogin.description: The administrator's login name of a servers in server group.

ServerGroupServer.description: Represents a server in a cluster.

systemData.description: The system metadata relating to this resource

properties.description: The properties of a server in a cluster.

ServerGroupServerListResult.description: A list of servers in a server group.

value.description: The list of servers in a server group.

location.description: The location the resource resides in.

tags.description: Application-specific metadata in the form of key-value pairs.

ClusterPropertiesForUpdate.description: The properties used to update a cluster.

administratorLoginPassword.description: The password of the administrator login.

postgresqlVersion.description: The PostgreSQL version of the cluster.

citusVersion.description: The Citus version of the cluster.

enableShardsOnCoordinator.description: If shards on coordinator is enabled or not for the cluster.

enableHa.description: If high availability is enabled or not for the cluster.

preferredPrimaryZone.description: Preferred primary zone for the cluster

coordinatorServerEdition.description: The edition of the coordinator (default: GeneralPurpose).

coordinatorStorageQuotaInMb.description: The storage of the coordinator in MB (max: 2097152 = 2TiB).

coordinatorVCores.description: The vCores count of the coordinator (max: 64).

coordinatorEnablePublicIpAccess.description: If public IP is requested or not for the coordinator.

nodeServerEdition.description: The edition of a node (default: MemoryOptimized).

nodeCount.description: Worker node count of the cluster

nodeStorageQuotaInMb.description: The storage of a node in MB (max: 2097152 = 2TiB).

nodeVCores.description: The vCores count of a node (max: 64).

nodeEnablePublicIpAccess.description: If public IP is requested or not for a node.

nextLink.description: The link used to get the next page of operations.

ClusterProperties.description: The properties used to create a new cluster.

administratorLoginPassword.description: The password of the administrator login.

enableShardsOnCoordinator.description: If shards on coordinator is enabled or not for the cluster.

earliestRestoreTime.description: The earliest restore point time (ISO8601 format) for the cluster.

enableHa.description: If high availability is enabled or not for the cluster.

preferredPrimaryZone.description: Preferred primary zone for the cluster

coordinatorServerEdition.description: The edition of the coordinator (default: GeneralPurpose).

coordinatorStorageQuotaInMb.description: The storage of the coordinator in MB (max: 2097152 = 2TiB).

coordinatorVCores.description: The vCores count of the coordinator (max: 64).

coordinatorEnablePublicIpAccess.description: If public IP is requested or not for the coordinator.

nodeServerEdition.description: The edition of a node (default: MemoryOptimized).

nodeCount.description: Worker node count of the cluster

nodeStorageQuotaInMb.description: The storage of a node in MB (max: 2097152 = 2TiB).

nodeVCores.description: The vCores count of a node (max: 64).

nodeEnablePublicIpAccess.description: If public IP is requested or not for a node.

sourceResourceId.description: The source resource id to restore from. It's required for 'PointInTimeRestore' or 'ReadReplica' operations

sourceLocation.description: The source cluster location to restore from. It's required for 'PointInTimeRestore' or 'ReadReplica' operations

pointInTimeUTC.description: Restore point creation time (ISO8601 format), specifying the time to restore from. It's required for'PointInTimeRestore' operation

ClusterResponse.description: Represents a cluster in response body.

systemData.description: The system metadata relating to this resource

properties.description: Properties of the cluster response body.

ClusterResponseProperties.description: roperties of the cluster response body.

state.description: A state of a cluster/server that is visible to user.

administratorLogin.description: Administrator Login username for the PostgreSQL

preferredPrimaryZone.description: Preferred primary zone for the cluster

enableShardsOnCoordinator.description: If shards on coordinator is enabled or not for the cluster.

enableHa.description: If high availability is enabled or not for the server.

coordinatorServerEdition.description: The edition of a coordinator server (default: GeneralPurpose).

coordinatorStorageQuotaInMb.description: The storage of a server in MB (max: 2097152 = 2TiB).

coordinatorVCores.description: The vCores count of a server (max: 64).

coordinatorEnablePublicIpAccess.description: If public IP is requested or not for a server.

nodeServerEdition.description: The edition of a node server (default: MemoryOptimized).

nodeCount.description: Worker node count of the cluster

nodeStorageQuotaInMb.description: The storage of a server in MB (max: 2097152 = 2TiB).

nodeVCores.description: The vCores count of a server (max: 64).

nodeEnablePublicIpAccess.description: If public IP is requested or not for a server.

serverNames.description: The list of server names in the cluster

sourceCluster.description: The source server group id for read replica clusters.

readReplicas.description: The array of read replica clusters.

earliestRestoreTime.description: The earliest restore point time (ISO8601 format) for the cluster.

privateEndpointConnections.description: The private endpoint connections for a cluster.

customWindow.description: indicates whether custom window is enabled or disabled

dayOfWeek.description: day of week for maintenance window

ServerGroupConfiguration.description: Represents the configuration list of server role groups in a server group.

properties.description: The properties of server group configuration.

role.description: The role of servers in the server role group.

value.description: The list of server group configurations.

nextLink.description: Link to retrieve next page of results.

FirewallRuleProperties.description: The properties of a server group firewall rule.

startIpAddress.description: The start IP address of the server group firewall rule. Must be IPv4 format.

endIpAddress.description: The end IP address of the server group firewall rule. Must be IPv4 format.

FirewallRule.description: Represents a server group firewall rule.

properties.description: The properties of a firewall rule.

value.description: The list of firewall rules in a server group.

password.description: The password of the server group role.

RoleProperties.description: The properties of a server group role.

value.description: The list of roles in a server group.

OperationDisplay.description: Display metadata associated with the operation.

resource.description: Resource on which the operation is performed.

operation.description: Localized friendly name for the operation.

name.description: The name of the operation being performed on this particular object.

display.description: The localized display information for this particular operation or action.

isDataAction.description: Indicates whether the operation is a data action

origin.description: The intended executor of the operation.

OperationListResult.description: A list of resource provider operations.

nextLink.description:
URL client should use to fetch the next page (per server side paging).
It's null for now, added for future use.

NameAvailabilityRequest.description: Request from client to check resource name availability.

nameAvailable.description: Indicates whether the resource name is available.

id.description: Resource id of the private endpoint.

properties.description: Properties of the private link resource.

groupId.description: The private link resource group id.

memberNames.description: The private link resource required member names.

zoneNames.description: The private link resource zone names.

value.description: The list of private link resources.

nextLink.description: The link used to get the next page of private link resources.

PrivateEndpointConnectionProperties.description: The properties used to create a private endpoint connection

privateEndpoint.description: Private endpoint which the connection belongs to.

privateLinkServiceConnectionState.description: Connection state of the private endpoint connection.

provisioningState.description: State of the private endpoint connection.

actionsRequired.description: The actions required for private link service connection.

description.description: The private link service connection description.

status.description: The private link service connection status.

CloudError.description: An error response from the Batch service.

CloudErrorBody.description: An error response from the Batch service.

code.description: An identifier for the error. Codes are invariant and are intended to be consumed programmatically.

message.description: A message describing the error, intended to be suitable for display in a user interface.

target.description: The target of the particular error. For example, the name of the property in error.

details.description: A list of additional details about the error.
